elements.name: Track changes to data over time.  Who change it, what changed (before & after data), when did it change.
Provide updated entities of interest in a message channel when data changes.
Accept data for processing without blocking request thread (asynchronous).
Support "Integrate Non-Critical System Errors " architectural pattern.
Provide results for asynchronous requests, both success and failure.
Notification when important field on a simple entity is set, updated, or unset.
Ability to trigger events when data changes.
Resilliant when issues occur with dependent components such as databases.
Visiblity into issues with external depedencies.
Sensitive attributes on entities require special authorization.
Authentication of requests is not part of lightblue.
Authorization of requests is not part of lightblue.
Application layer must scale as load increases.
Instances of services must be load balanced.
Instances of applications must be load balanced.
Floods of requests from specific clients should not cause service degredation.
Throttle requests at individual service instance.
Throttle requests at the load balancer / proxy layer.
Load balance out of scope of lightblue.
CRUD against data that is managed by existing (legacy) services.
Lack of date standards in MongoDB.
Define standard for use of date / timestamp.
Notification when important entity record is created.
Notification when important entity record is deleted.
Notification when important entity record is deleted. (copy)
Monitor request metrics:  frequency, processing time
Must fall back on default version for each entity.
Metadata attributes that don't impact customers shouldn't result in a version change.
Aggregation is very close to data
Deploy aggregation and data together but keep separate in component architecture.
OpenShift keeps actively accessed programs awake, else puts them to sleep.
Gson not work with dynamic schemas
Operational data grows as record is audited
Pruning is edit of operational data
Data set grows separate from operational data
Isolate simple entities from each other.
View related entities as a single unit
Aggregation adds joins and therefore adds complexity.
Indexes should be created as needed to ensure performance of general use cases.
Store things that don't impact clients outside of metadata: default version, indexes, hooks, datastore
Application to provide metadata management capabilitiies.
Application to provide data management capabilitiies
Removing a value from enum must fail if that value is used in any data.
Turn it on and off without change request.
Don't log all the things all the time!
Can toggle logging dynamically and have effect immediately.
Get state of a record at a specific time.
Restrict database access to DBA's and specific services.
Allow metadata service CRUD access to MongoDB.
Allow data service CRUD access to MongoDB.
Disable localhost admin login for MongoDB.
Legacy consumers completely transition to lightblue.
Migration of data to lightblue collections.
